Why Businesses Struggle with Manual Data Collection

Hours Wasted on Manual Entry

Teams pour valuable hours into copy-pasting data that instantly becomes stale, delaying strategic decisions.

Average team loses 12 hours every week to manual sourcing.

Errors That Cost You Deals

Manual sheets hide inconsistencies, leading to inaccurate quotes, missed outreach, and broken forecasts.

Data errors contribute to 18% revenue leakage across pipelines.

Blocked by Anti-Scraping Systems

Rate limits, CAPTCHAs, and IP bans halt progress, forcing teams into expensive tooling with steep learning curves.

68% of DIY scraping projects fail in the first month.

Before

Fragmented sources, manual collection, inaccurate dashboards.

After

Automated pipelines, unified data mesh, validated dashboards.

Let MRI Data Handle the Complexity

  • Extract accurate datasets from any public or gated site without rework.
  • Bypass CAPTCHAs, rotating proxies, and anti-bot barriers automatically.
  • Receive clean, normalized datasets in CSV, JSON, or via API.
  • Scale from pilot projects to millions of records with zero downtime.
  • Deploy bespoke pipelines in 48 hours with ongoing tuning.
  • Round-the-clock monitoring and incident response from the MRI Data team.

Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

Universal Compatibility

Capture structured data from static sites, SPAs, marketplaces, and private portals.

Anti-Bot Bypass

Advanced fingerprinting, proxy rotation, and CAPTCHA solving keep access uninterrupted.

Clean, Structured Output

Data arrives normalized with validation rules, deduplication, and schema checks.

24/7 Monitoring

Automated alerts surface selector changes and anti-bot updates before they break workflows.

Infinite Scalability

Elastic infrastructure adapts to spike loads without throttling or rate limit penalties.

48-Hour Deployment

Kick off with a production-ready pipeline in two days backed by iterative tuning.

Seamless Integration

Push datasets to your CRM, data warehouse, or BI stack without custom code.

Legal & Compliant

End-to-end compliance reviews ensure ethical sourcing aligned with regulations.

Frequently Asked Questions

We support static pages, client-rendered applications, marketplaces, classifieds, and member-only portals with lawful access.

Most solutions reach production in 48 hours. Complex, multi-source deployments may take up to one week including QA.

We operate with legal review, terms-of-service checks, and GDPR compliance to ensure data is sourced ethically and responsibly.

Choose from CSV, JSON, XLSX, or direct delivery to your data warehouse via S3, Snowflake, or REST APIs.

Our monitoring detects selector updates and blocking events automatically. Engineers adjust pipelines before output is impacted.

We support authenticated experiences when clients provide licensed credentials and legal access, following compliance guidelines.

Pricing is based on data volume, refresh frequency, and complexity. Engagements start with a free sample before proposals.

Yes, every engagement begins with a scoped data sample so you can validate quality and format before scaling up.

We are one message away. Discuss your project and we will tailor a roadmap around your data needs and internal systems.
